text: Jorge Paulo Lemann (born August 26, 1939) is a Brazilian billionaire investment banker, and businessman.Jorge Paulo Lemann. Internationales Biographisches Archiv 24/2018 vom 12. Juni 2018. Retrieved 12 April 2020. In 1971, Lemann, Carlos Alberto Sicupira and Marcel Herrmann Telles founded the Brazilian investment banking firm Banco Garantia. In 1994, he suffered a heart attack at age 54. From 1990 to 2001, he was a member of the board of directors of Companhia Cervejaria Brahma.Inbev Prospectus January 2005 As of October 2019, Lemann was ranked 37th richest in the world by Forbes, with a net worth of . ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Jorge Paulo Lemann
